home.introduction: I'm Vivian, a web developer and i want to share my experiences. I am currently working on web design & UI/UX !

about.header: My name is Vivian, I am a web developer who is enthusiastic about creating, shaping and experimenting !
about.about1: Surrounded by creative people from different fields (2D cinematic animation, music, photography...), I discovered the pleasure of letting your artistic fiber express itself. Thus, I wanted to discover the world of web design.
about.about2: This site acts as a portfolio of my experiences, front-end skills, but is above all a challenge that I set myself. The very first site that I imagined and developed.

contact.header:
Merci beaucoup de me faire des retours sur mon travail !
      J'ai hâte de savoir ce que vous en avez pensé, et comment je pourrais l'améliorer
contact.email: Vous pouvez principalement me contacter par email :
